title: Dirt 3
notes: Upon launch, displays blank/black screen.
os: KDE Neon Developer Edition (Ubuntu 16.04 base, kernel 4.18.5)

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: The game works like a charm, however it doesn't play nice with tiling window managers (at least xmonad), I tried to resize the window and the game turned into a black screen, the audio still played, but the game was unresponsive

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: Workaround - "cl_fullscreen 0" in Steam Properties to get around an OS hang, some graphical issues on physics cloths like the starting flag.

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: Crashed on full-screen, made system hang.

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: Sometimes make a black screen when open the game, but, close and open again.

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: Workaround: "cl_fullscreen 0" to the launch parameter, to prevent black screen on launch. Also need to disbale rumble for the gamepad, to prevent the gamepad freezing.

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: Some sounds do not play, sometimes it's the engine, sometimes the music, sometimes the navigator

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition

title: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
notes: Using a controller Redragon Seymur 2, there are many dmesg messages as "[12366.597170] dragonrise 0003:0079:0006.0001: output queue full", I'm not sure what should be wrong with this, maybe the rumble, as the controls are fine. Newer version of Mesa with LLVM 7 is faster and more stable, but minimizing the game for long enough makes it freeze, common problem I have with DXVK. Sound is perfect now.
